name: The Menagerie (2021)
description:
Click on the window to focus.

WASD or Arrow Keys to control.

Visit The Menagerie and explore the varied behaviours of the inhabitants who live there. Take your time to examine how they all move in unique ways and how the smartest ones will even respond to your actions.

There's a brand new attraction, some claim it is the most intelligent of all the creatures we've ever had here at The Menagerie.
